title: Confessing My Love To Him, The Treacherous One
alternative_title: Xiang Weixian De Ta Gaobaile; Xiàng Wéixiǎn De Tā Gàobáile; 向危险的他告白了
status: Xiang Weixian De Ta Gaobaile; Xiàng Wéixiǎn De Tā Gàobáile; 向危险的他告白了
description:
Description :
        After rebirth, she only wanted revenge, but accidentally confessed to the most dangerous man in the empire? As the only daughter of the earl, Anfia was tricked by her stepmother and stepsister into marrying a scumbag, and then she was abused and died tragically. After rebirth, she turned into a green tea and prepared to intercept her stepsister's love for the young master of the Duke's Mansion, Eli, but she didn't expect an accident to happen, and she was forced to confess to Eli's uncle! Help, this man is notoriously difficult to deal with, is it too late to withdraw a confession now?
